data.title: Fixed wrong variable names
data.body: Found 2 methods with wrong parameter names. Calling them would crash Scons build.

data.title: Scenes are unable to remember it's nodes fold state
data.body:
**Edit: from Eska tests it seems this bug is related to scene inheritance**
Currently when we are opening new scene all the nodes in the tree in 'scene' tab are unfolded at the start. I think the scene should remember 'fold status' between sessions. Eventually all the nodes below first level should be folded by default.
Further more if we change scene and come back the tree always will be unfolded  - despite the fact we have already folded it in mean time: 
![scenetreefolded](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/6129594/12455387/c72ecc96-bf9b-11e5-9958-23662eb34261.gif)

data.title: Wider initial size of the panel with scripts
data.body:
I believe it's size is now exactly the same how it was before commit that allowed to hide script panel entirely (https://github.com/godotengine/godot/commit/d4a2409334764f2b29503a93c505603ec122c8db). 
I assume previously it was 140 wide because of 70px of minimal size + 70px of offset, so now when minimal size is 0 the offset need to be 140.

data.title: dupicate() don't copy internal variables values
data.body:
Duplicate method don't take into account variable values of duplication root as well as internal nodes. 
I have prepared small test project that can be used to detect some issues related to duplication:
[DuplicateTests.zip](https://github.com/godotengine/godot/files/97344/DuplicateTests.zip) 
it test various scenarios and report results in output console in the following form:

```
(...)
Translation test: SUCCESS
Root export variable test: SUCCESS
Inner export variable test: SUCCESS
Root variable value test: FAIL
Inner variable val test: FAIL
Inner node structure test: SUCCESS

Summary result: FAIL
```

data.title: fix string conversion in javascript export
data.body:
fixes the following compile error (introduced in #3391):

```
platform/javascript/export/export.cpp:188:78: error: conditional expression is ambiguous; 'String' can be converted to 'Variant' and vice versa
  ...?html_title: Globals::get_singleton()->get("application/name"));
     ^~~~~~~~~~~  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

```

data.title: Overhaul web export page
data.body:
This change trims the web export page.
## Changes
- Minimum size is canvas size, so no scrollbars as long as the game fits, e.g. for `iframe`
- Controls as overlay, hidden until hover
  - Can be disabled completely
- Status display as overlay
  - Hides on click (for emergency, in case status freezes...)
- Output only visible in debug export
  - Visibility can be toggled per controls
- Godot default theme style
- Should be HTML/XML polyglot (but hard to verify)
- Separate Emscripten interface `Module` logic from page `Presentation` logic
- Add export options to customize page:
  - Page title (`<title>`)
  - `<head>` include
  - Fonts (`font-family`)
  - CSS include
  - Controls visibility
- Prevent exception when clicking fullscreen button before fully loaded
- Fix canvas being smaller than game
- Fix iframed page not regaining focus on click
## Demonstration

![web-export-options](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/6996191/12439577/46cc9182-bf32-11e5-9130-41a3a71c63fa.png)
_These settings are also used for the following demonstrations._
- Debug export:
  https://googledrive.com/host/0B1lsc05JnCtrSUtiT25pRVdTR1k
- Release export, controls disabled, in `iframe`:
  https://googledrive.com/host/0B1lsc05JnCtrVXdCNWh4TTRXaVE

Closes #2774
## To do later:
- Implement canvas resize
  - Substract output height when visible
- Implement fullscreen button properly
- Implement cursor lock toggle
- Less ridiculous vertical centering for status display
- Handle `webglcontextlost` event
- Style checkboxes — Hacky, would have to include "check" texture
- Spinner? — Seems annoying to me, maybe a loading bar when `setStatus` cooperates

data.title: duplicate groups and signals
data.body: Fixes #3379 and #1888

data.title: Image.put_pixel() doesn't work on Android
data.body:
I used Image.put_pixel() in my project and it works fine on Windows.But on Android this method has no effect, image doesn't change and i don't know why. I used Godot 2.0 build from 3 November(latest complete build from http://fixnum.org/godot/). I think it's a bug. I make small demo to show it. 

Demo https://github.com/Krosh/GodotBug

data.title: PackedScene data type support for exported array
data.body:
Currently it's impossible to put PackedScene into an exported array. It would be neat to have support for this data type. At the moment these types are supported: 
![packedscenearray](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/6129594/12422155/c2aa4d66-bec5-11e5-98c6-4735fc4bc30f.png)

data.title: Initialization bugs in inner classes with several (2) levels of inheritance
Error Release/Debug: 'class SceneTree' has no member named 'get_edited_scene_root'
data.body:
I got error on all my release and debug builds, only tool built correctly.

```
[21:21:48][Step 5/28] g++ -o scene/main/viewport.x11.debug.64.o -c -g2 -Wall -DDEBUG_ENABLED -DDEBUG_MEMORY_ENABLED -DFREETYPE_ENABLED -DOC_X86_ASM -DDEBUG_MEMORY_ALLOC -DSCI_NAMESPACE -DOPENGL_ENABLED -DGLEW_ENABLED -DALSA_ENABLED -DX11_ENABLED -DUNIX_ENABLED -DGLES2_ENABLED -DGLES_OVER_GL -DMUSEPACK_ENABLED -DOPENSSL_ENABLED -DSQUISH_ENABLED -DVORBIS_ENABLED -DOPUS_ENABLED -DTHEORA_ENABLED -DTHEORALIB_ENABLED -DPNG_ENABLED -DDDS_ENABLED -DPVR_ENABLED -DJPG_ENABLED -DWEBP_ENABLED -DSPEEX_ENABLED -DGDSCRIPT_ENABLED -DMINIZIP_ENABLED -DXML_ENABLED -DETC1_ENABLED -DPNG_ARM_NEON_OPT=0 -Icore -Icore/math -Itools -Idrivers -I. -Iplatform/x11 -I/usr/include/freetype2 -Iscene/main/vorbis scene/main/viewport.cpp
[21:21:49][Step 5/28] scene/main/viewport.cpp: In member function 'void Viewport::_vp_input(const InputEvent&)':
[21:21:49][Step 5/28] scene/main/viewport.cpp:1282:50: error: 'class SceneTree' has no member named 'get_edited_scene_root'
[21:21:49][Step 5/28]   if (get_tree()->is_editor_hint() && get_tree()->get_edited_scene_root()->is_a_parent_of(this)) {
[21:21:49][Step 5/28]                                                   ^
[21:21:49][Step 5/28] scene/main/viewport.cpp: In member function 'void Viewport::_vp_unhandled_input(const InputEvent&)':
[21:21:49][Step 5/28] scene/main/viewport.cpp:1307:50: error: 'class SceneTree' has no member named 'get_edited_scene_root'
[21:21:49][Step 5/28]   if (get_tree()->is_editor_hint() && get_tree()->get_edited_scene_root()->is_a_parent_of(this)) {
```

data.title: Fix build with tools=no
data.body: Fixes #3384.

data.title: viewport.cpp:1307:50: error - templates compilation error.
data.body:
48 hours ago everything was compiling without errors.
Today compilation of templates after git pull always stops at:

```
scene/main/viewport.cpp: In member function 'void Viewport::_vp_input(const InputEvent&)':
scene/main/viewport.cpp:1282:50: error: 'class SceneTree' has no member named 'get_edited_scene_root'
  if (get_tree()->is_editor_hint() && get_tree()->get_edited_scene_root()->is_a_parent_of(this)) {
                                                  ^
scene/main/viewport.cpp: In member function 'void Viewport::_vp_unhandled_input(const InputEvent&)':
scene/main/viewport.cpp:1307:50: error: 'class SceneTree' has no member named 'get_edited_scene_root'
  if (get_tree()->is_editor_hint() && get_tree()->get_edited_scene_root()->is_a_parent_of(this)) {
```

Godot engine compiles without error in the same time.

I use xubuntu 14.04 LTS.

data.title: collisionShape.make_convex_from_brothers() doesnt work.
data.body:
There is a problem with convex and concave physic shapes.
I tried a lot but I couldn´t get it working. It changes the shape and it applies the right array to it but the physic engine still uses the shape settings I applied in the editor.

data.title: thumbnail preview for AtlasTextures
data.body:
Fixes #3372 
AtlasTextures that reference a `LargeTexture` will still show the default icon, but I think regular Textures are the most common case.

Also fix some responsiveness issues:
-Box selection no longer visible when connecting.
-Allow cancel connection with mouse's right button.

@reduz  @akien-mga check this out, it's scheduled for 2.0

data.title: Crash without any error in debug console
data.body: Accidentally clicked 'enter' again.. Not ready to post this issue since I don't have good amount of data. Archiving for now.

data.title: Groups are not duplicated when using duplicate()
data.body:
1. Create a scene and put it into a group: "SampleGroup" from the editor interface.
2. Duplicate this scene in runtime with duplicate() method.
3. Duplicated scene will not be in the "SampleGroup".

Similar issue but with signals: https://github.com/godotengine/godot/issues/1888

data.title: duplicate() is returning null for scenes with "Load As Placeholder" subscenes
data.body:
If there is Placeholder subscene in the scene then it's impossible to duplicate it in runtime with .duplicate() method (it's returning null). Tested in 4290a25bd54623be1fee4db2911f7ddcc9b88ba8
video: https://youtu.be/gctzE7t-j3I
sample project: https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/168251/godot/bugsquad/DuplicateIsNullSample.7z

data.title: missed rename "keep_screen_on" for ios
Warning about possible wrong usage of emit_signal in script_editor_debugger
data.body:
I caught this warning while compiling with gcc:

```
tools/editor/script_editor_debugger.cpp: In member function 'void ScriptEditorDebugger::_parse_message(const String&, const Array&)':
tools/editor/script_editor_debugger.cpp:224:36: warning: converting 'false' to pointer type for argument 2 of 'void Object::emit_signal(const StringName&, const Variant**, int)' [-Wconversion-null]
   emit_signal("breaked",false,false);
                                    ^
```

It comes from this line: https://github.com/godotengine/godot/blob/74a48a0/tools/editor/script_editor_debugger.cpp#L226
though this one might also trigger a similar warning: https://github.com/godotengine/godot/blob/74a48a0/tools/editor/script_editor_debugger.cpp#L209.

It looks like the call is matched to this function:
https://github.com/godotengine/godot/blob/3d0bd1a/core/object.h#L596
`void emit_signal(const StringName& p_name,VARIANT_ARG_LIST);`
when what is intended is probably the first one:
https://github.com/godotengine/godot/blob/3d0bd1a/core/object.h#L595
`void emit_signal(const StringName& p_name, const Variant** p_args, int p_argcount);`

Would changing the order of the two declarations fix the issue? Or is there a better way?

data.title: Resize mouse cursor icon is not showing anymore
data.body:
In current 4290a25bd54623be1fee4db2911f7ddcc9b88ba8 build, the resize mouse cursor is not appearing anymore near the docs and other resizable elements. It's still possible to resize normally however.

| Old (correct) | Current |
| --- | --- |
| ![cursorold](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/6129594/12390213/56b048d2-bdde-11e5-987b-feef5e84be3c.gif) | ![newcursor](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/6129594/12390216/5df66338-bdde-11e5-979f-e2467d9142c7.gif) |

data.title: get_simple_path terminate.
data.body:
I use Navigation2D, I use get_simple_path in begin and end point at navigation polygon not joint it will terminate when run it.

This is example
https://www.dropbox.com/s/61w7kdwkvq3rfpc/testNavigation2D.zip?dl=0

data.title: EditorScript 's compile errors are not logged in Console
data.body:
When writing an script to run in the editor bugs like undefined vars are not logged and when trying to run only feedback is a reminder to use tool keyword, same happens if you try to inherit another class instead of EditorScript.

Error logs are in godot's command window (if std-out is enabled)

data.title: No file preview for AtlasTextures
data.body:
A small feature request:
Preview on *.atex resources for the Filesystem dock / FileDialog.

I frequently use AtlasTextures to conviently access single tiles in a spritesheet, so I don't have to manually specify texture regions everywhere. Being able to instantly see which tile I'm after right in the FileDialog, would be very helpful :)

data.title: Camera and raycast previews don't show in subscenes
data.body:
When I import a scene with a camera and/or a raycast, the previews for both disappear, I recreated this by using Oxrock's raycast demo, by converting the player node into a subscene and then reimporting it after deleting the original. I've been experiencing this in a game I'm developing as well.
Before:
![godot engine - raydemo - new_scene scn - _107](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/8548727/12380671/7fe97af2-bd70-11e5-9ec8-f0303d66c6cd.png)

After (as a subscene):
![godot engine - raydemo - new_scene scn_108](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/8548727/12380672/816cc302-bd70-11e5-9f41-3477270fc707.png)

Link to Demo: https://github.com/oxrock/Godot-camera-raycasting-demo

Version used: Linux x86.64, compiled from source the same day as I posted this.

data.title: New shader nodes are now created under (more or less) the cursor.
data.body:
Shader nodes were created at seemingly random locations. It happened because get_local_mouse_pos doesn't take into account scroll offset.

A new public method has been created in graph_edit.cpp to allow reading the scroll offset.

data.title: 'fatal error: openssl/opensslconf.h: No such file or directory' while building x11 32-bit export templates
data.body: Location of opensslconf.h file is /usr/include/x86_64-linux-gnu/openssl/ so builder can't find it.

data.title: Crash/Segmentation fault when using "Rename or Move"
data.body:
When I tried to use "Rename or Move" (in the filesystem dock) on a normal `.tscn` scene, that was used in only one other scene, godot crashed. Here is the log:

```
#....
ERROR: ensure_tab_visible: Index p_idx out of size (tabs.size()).
   At: scene/gui/tabs.cpp:653.
settings changed
ERROR: get_node: Node not found: /root/EditorNode/@@7/@@11/@@13/@@17/@@21/@@22/@@23/@@39/@@40/@@42/@@47/@@8102/@@8013/@@8014/@@8015/@@8016/@@8017/level
   At: scene/main/node.cpp:928.
ERROR: set_current_tab: Index p_current out of size (get_tab_count()).
   At: scene/gui/tabs.cpp:489.
ERROR: ensure_tab_visible: Index p_idx out of size (tabs.size()).
   At: scene/gui/tabs.cpp:653.
found files to remap: 1
fish: “godot -e” terminated by signal SIGSEGV (Address boundary error)
```

OS-related stuff:

| Key | Value |
| --- | --- |
| OS | Linux |
| Distro | Arch Linux |
| Shell | `fish` |
| Godot version | 72fcb8a35beab251d01864bc67da3e3a8e75aed6 (`platform=x11` `target=release_debug` `tools=yes`) |

data.title: Improved "Quick Open" dialog navigation
data.body:
I changed the dialog Tree navigation for when the search box is focused, now it will behave like in Godot 1.1, when the multiple selection is enabled and navigating with up, down, page-up and page-down.

Closes #3362.
